ubuntu@ubuntu-Veriton-M200-H81:~$ python AES.py
Enter the plaintext : 
hello sir
Enter the key : 
50
Cipher text after encryption is : 
10110111000101110110110010011100101001001110111110110000011110101111110001011001

Plain text after decryption is : 
01101000011001010110110001101100011011110010000001110011011010010111001000100011
hello sir
